mapper.select: SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.payment.payment.service.impl.MobileTicketApiMapper.selectMobileTicketReqStus] 20191108 - KR HAN */ DISTINCT MOB_TICKET_NO MOB_TICKET_NO , TICKET_TYPE_ID TICKET_TYPE_ID FROM MOB0001D WHERE MOB_TICKET_NO = #{mobTicketNo} AND TICKET_STUS_ID = '1'

SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.payment.payment.service.impl.MobileTicketApiMapper.selectMobileTicketBillingGroupDetail] 20191111 - KR HAN */ A.TICKET_TYPE_ID TICKET_TYPE_ID , ( SELECT CUST_BILL_GRP_NO FROM SAL0024D C WHERE C.CUST_BILL_ID = B.CUST_BILL_ID_OLD ) CUST_BILL_NO_OLD , ( SELECT CUST_BILL_GRP_NO FROM SAL0024D C WHERE C.CUST_BILL_ID = B.CUST_BILL_ID_NW ) CUST_BILL_NO_NW , NVL(B.REM, '') AS REM FROM MOB0001D A JOIN PAY0299D B ON A.SALES_ORD_NO= B.SALES_ORD_NO AND A.MOB_TICKET_NO = B.MOB_TICKET_NO WHERE A.MOB_TICKET_NO = #{mobTicketNo}

SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.payment.payment.service.impl.MobileTicketApiMapper.selectMobileTicketPaymentKeyInDetail] 20191111 - KR HAN */ A.TICKET_TYPE_ID TICKET_TYPE_ID , A.SALES_ORD_NO SALES_ORD_NO , B.PAY_MODE PAY_MODE , C.CODE_NAME PAY_MODE_NAME , B.PAY_AMT PAY_AMT , B.PAY_REM AS REM FROM MOB0001D A JOIN PAY0297D B ON A.MOB_TICKET_NO = B.MOB_TICKET_NO JOIN SYS0013M C ON B.PAY_MODE = C.CODE_ID AND C.CODE_MASTER_ID = 439 WHERE A.MOB_TICKET_NO = #{mobTicketNo}

SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.payment.payment.service.impl.MobileTicketApiMapper.selectMobileTicketInvoiceDetail] 20191112 - KR HAN */ t1.MOB_TICKET_NO , t1.TICKET_TYPE_ID , LISTAGG(t1.SALES_ORD_NO,',') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY t1.SALES_ORD_NO) AS SALES_ORD_NO , t1.INVC_TYPE , t1.EMAIL , t1.ADD_EMAIL , t1.INVC_ADV_PRD , t1.REQ_INVC , t1.DISC_RATE , t1.REM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.MOB_TICKET_NO MOB_TICKET_NO , A.TICKET_TYPE_ID TICKET_TYPE_ID , A.SALES_ORD_NO SALES_ORD_NO , B.INVC_TYPE INVC_TYPE , C.EMAIL EMAIL , C.EMAIL2 ADD_EMAIL , C.INVC_ADV_PRD INVC_ADV_PRD , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(C.REQ_INVC_YEAR||C.REQ_INVC_MONTH, 'YYYYMM'), 'MM/YYYY')||' ~ '||TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(C.REQ_INVC_YEAR||C.REQ_INVC_MONTH, 'YYYYMM'), C.INVC_ADV_PRD) , 'MM/YYYY') REQ_INVC , C.INVC_ITM_DISC_RATE DISC_RATE , B.REM FROM MOB0001D A JOIN PAY0300D B ON A.MOB_TICKET_NO = B.MOB_TICKET_NO JOIN PAY0301D C ON B.REQ_INVC_NO = C.REQ_INVC_NO WHERE A.MOB_TICKET_NO = #{mobTicketNo} ) t1 GROUP BY t1.MOB_TICKET_NO, t1.TICKET_TYPE_ID, t1.INVC_TYPE, t1.EMAIL, t1.ADD_EMAIL, t1.INVC_ADV_PRD, t1.REQ_INVC, t1.DISC_RATE, t1.REM

SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.payment.payment.service.impl.MobileTicketApiMapper.selectMobileTicketInvoiceDetail] 20191112 - KR HAN */ A.MOB_TICKET_NO MOB_TICKET_NO , A.TICKET_TYPE_ID TICKET_TYPE_ID , A.SALES_ORD_NO SALES_ORD_NO , B.WOR_NO WOR_NO , B.AMT PAY_AMT , B.REM FROM MOB0001D A JOIN PAY0298D B ON A.MOB_TICKET_NO = B.MOB_TICKET_NO WHERE A.MOB_TICKET_NO = #{mobTicketNo}

SELECT /* [com.coway.trust.biz.payment.payment.service.impl.MobileTicketApiMapper.selectMobileTicketFundTransferDetail] 20191112 - KR HAN */ A.MOB_TICKET_NO MOB_TICKET_NO , A.TICKET_TYPE_ID TICKET_TYPE_ID , B.CUR_ORD_NO ORD_NO_OLD , B.CUR_WOR_NO WOR_NO , B.CUR_AMT CUR_AMT , B.NEW_ORD_NO ORD_NO_NW , B.FT_REM FROM MOB0001D A JOIN PAY0296D B ON A.MOB_TICKET_NO = B.MOB_TICKET_NO WHERE A.MOB_TICKET_NO = #{mobTicketNo}
